mods:mods.mods:abstract: Annotation on back: Boy used in front cover design of AICP "Year Book 1917" (1916-1917) Hine

Description: Box 297 Folder 8 #1904 This photo has Hine written on the back but, as the others in the series are stamped Jessie Tarbox Beals, it seems unlikely that this one is by Hine. Boy only used in front cover design for AICP "Year Book, 1917," 74th Annual Report, 1916-1917. Boy only used in center fold Christmas appeal in Bagdad on the Subway; A Monthly Bulletin of Association News, No. 3, Dec.1917, between pages 7 & 10. Heading: ANSWER THE QUESTION IN THE HEARTS OP THESE KIDDIES Is Santa Claus Going to Visit them? YOU know - It is up to YOU Remember - this Appeal is for NECESSITIES - NOT for luxuries Food, Clothing, Fuel, Shoes, Rent, Nurses' Care Boy only on first page of Bagdad on the Subwav: No. 8, Nov. 1919 Heading: THANKSGIVING AND ----
